original: Dickson, Peter A., direktör, Göteborg, f. 3/4/06 i Överås, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. — Genomg. Lundsbergs sk. o. tekn. sk. Anst. v. Citroénfabr. i Paris 25-26, start. P. Dicksons Bilfirma 27, anst. h. Dickson & Sjöstad! 28-34, verkst. dir. i A-B Gbgs Fruktaffär sed. 36, start. A-B Bankirfirman Dickson 36, deläg. i Firma Dickson & Ahlmo. Ordf. i styr. f. A-B Bankirfirman Dickson, honorary Secretary i Bache’lor’s club, iled. av styr f. Ba-che(lioT’s club, J. J. Dicksons stifft., Haralds minne m. fl.
translated: Dickson, Peter A., director, Gothenburg, born on April 3, 1906 in Överås, Gothenburg and Bohuslän 1. He attended Lundsbergs school and technical school. He worked at the Citroën factory in Paris from 1925-1926, and started P. Dickson's Car Company in 1927. He was employed by Dickson & Sjöstad from 1928 to 1934, and served as the managing director of A-B Gothenburg Fruit Shop since 1936. He started A-B Bankirfirman Dickson in 1936 and was a co-owner of the company, Dickson & Ahlmo. He was also the chairman of the board for A-B Bankirfirman Dickson, the honorary secretary of Bache'lor's club, and a member of the committee for J.J. Dickson's foundation, Harald's memory, and others. Note that '\d\d m. partners name' means that the person married in the year 19xx.

workHistory.name: A-B Bankirfirman Dickson
workHistory.jobTitle: Founder, Co-owner and Chairman of the Board
